start-box.title: Welcome to
start-box.description: Discover utilities to support working and chatting with relatives and friends optimized for your device.

0.title: Real-time messaging
0.description: Messages are sent and received instantly between users in a conversation.

1.title: Messages delete themselves
1.description: Messages will automatically delete themselves after a certain period of time.

2.title: Chat with everyone via WebChat Group

3.title: Experience throughout
3.description: Connect and get work done on any device with data that is always synchronized

4.title: Send Files?
4.description: WebChat allows sending files in any format

5.title: Group chat with friends
5.description: More convenient, thanks to chat support tools on computers

friend-requests.title: Friend requests
friend-requests.empty: You don't have any friend requests yet

group-requests.title: Requests and invitations
group-requests.empty: You have not sent or received any requests to join the group

info.title: Group information

header.group-requests: List of requests to join the group

setting.allowChangeGName: Allow members to change group name
setting.allowSendGInvitation: Allows members to invite others to the group
setting.readRecentMessage: Allow new members to read recent messages
setting.joinGroupByLink: Allow using group code to join the group

info.reject-confirm: Are you sure you want to decline {{name}}'s request?
